column3: A Petrologic Comparison of Apollo 11 Soil 10084 and Disaggregated Regolith Breccia 10068
column4: Basu, A., Wentworth, S. J., McKay, D. S.
column9: The proto-regolith of breccia 10068 is finer and agglutinate-deficient than soil 10084. Breccia 10068 was likely assembled in post-mare basalt time but much earlier than the formation of soil 10084.
